Title: Three Outlaw Samurai
Writer: Keiichi Abe (screenplay), Hideo Gosha (screenplay), Eizaburo Shiba (screenplay)
Actors: Tetsurô Tanba, Isamu Nagato, Mikijirô Hira, Miyuki Kuwano
Plot: Shiba, a wandering ronin, encounters a band of peasants who have kidnapped the daughter of their dictatorial magistrate, in hopes of coercing from him a reduction in taxes. Shiba takes up their fight, joined by two renegades from the magistrate's guard, Sakura and Kikyo. The three outlaws find themselves in a battle to the death.
